metadata.title: Lavender Hydrosol (Floral Water) - 4 fl oz
description: Our floral waters are extremely versatile. They can be used in the manufacturing process anywhere that water is required. A simple way for the novice Aromatherapist to enjoy the therapeutic benefits of essential oils. Add to a soothing hot bath.
metadata.details: {"Brand": "GH", "Item Volume": "4 Fluid Ounces", "Scent": "Lavender", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Style": "Modern", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Date First Available": "May 28, 2010", "Manufacturer": "WFMED"}
